name: Chicken Tikka Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Chicken Tikka Recipe: Chicken 1 kg Water ½ cup Chili Powder 1 tbsp Ketchup 2 tbsp Vinegar 3 tbsp White Pepper 1/2 tsp Salt 1 ½ tsp Ginger Garlic 1 tbsp
instructions: Marinate chicken pieces with all above for 4 hours Put on skewers and BBQ, brushing with ghee Bake them in to pre heated oven, for 40 mins on 180 D 20 mins on each side remove and give dum of coal.
